page.title: 17Schoolboy Hobbies.
page.content: My favourite hobbies are swimming, shooting and camping. At our school, which is Slindon College, I can follow these hobbies easily. We have a swimming pool, and are allowed to use it at lunch times,weekends and Activities afternoons as well as during the Games lessons. There is a shooting club in school, but I do not use it any more, as I prefer to shoot at a club in Verden in Germany where my father is stationed with the Army. The school goes camping most weekends at Selsey in Sussex, where we can also canoe and do watersports with one of the Games teachers. When I go camping in Germany,there are very good tent facilities. We get issued with mosquito nets! I have never entered a proper shooting contest, but when I get back to Germany I will, with some of the soldiers.
